Field.FormMenuDescription: Pelvic Floor Distress Inventory Short Form 20 Scored
Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
Pelvic Floor Distress Inventory Questionnaire - Short Form 20

Please answer all of the questions in the following survey. These questions will ask you if you have certain bowel, bladder or pelvic symptoms and, if you do, how much they bother you. Answer each question by making the appropriate selection. If you are unsure about how to answer, please give the best answer you can. While answering these questions, please consider your symptoms over the last 3 months.
Field.ElementLabel: 1. Do you usually experience pressure in the lower abdomen?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 2. Do you usually experience heaviness or dullness in the lower abdomen?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 3. Do you usually have a bulge or something falling out that you can see or fell in the vaginal area?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 4. Do you ever have to push on the vagina or around the rectum to have a complete bowel movement?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 5. Do you usually experience a feeling of incomplete bladder emptying?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 6. Do you ever have to push up in the vaginal area with your fingers to start or complete urination?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 7. Do you feel you need to strain too hard to have a bowel movement?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 8. Do you feel you have not completely emptied your bowels at the end of a bowel movement?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 9. Do you usually lose stool beyond your control if your stool is well formed?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 10. Do you usually lose stool beyond your control if your stool is loose or liquid?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 11. Do you usually lose gas from the rectum beyond your control?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 12. Do you usually have pain when you pass your stool?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 13. Do you experience a strong sense of urgency and have to rush to the bathroom to have a bowel movement?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 14. Does part of your stool ever pass through the rectum and bulge outside during or after a bowel movement?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 15. Do you usually experience frequent urination?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 16. Do you usually experience ruine leakage associated with a feeling of urgency, that is, a strong sensation of needing to go to the bathroom?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 17. Do you usually experience urine leakage related to laughing, coughing, or sneezing?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 18. Do you usually experience small amounts of urine leakage (that is, drops)?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 19. Do you usually experience difficulty emptying your bladder?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: 20. Do you usually experience pain of discomfort in the lower abdomen or genital region?

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Yes \n 0, No

Field.ElementLabel: If Yes, how much does it bother you?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Somewhat 
 3, Moderately 
 4, Quite a bit

Field.ElementLabel: Scale score POPDI

ElementEnum.RawValue: round((sum(if([pfdi_1_s]!=1,[pfdi_1_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_2_s]!=1,[pfdi_2_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_3_s]!=1,[pfdi_3_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_4_s]!=1,[pfdi_4_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_5_s]!=1,[pfdi_5_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_6_s]!=1,[pfdi_6_s],'NaN'),if([pfdi_1a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_1a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_2a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_2a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_3a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_3a_s],'NaN'),if([pfdi_4a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_4a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_5a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_5a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_6a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_6a_s], 'NaN') ) / sum( if ([pfdi_1_s] = 0, 1, 0) , if ([pfdi_2_s] = 0, 1, 0) , if ([pfdi_3_s] = 0, 1, 0) , if ([pfdi_4_s] = 0, 1, 0) , if ([pfdi_5_s] = 0, 1, 0) , if ([pfdi_6_s] = 0, 1, 0), if([pfdi_1a_s]!='NaN',1,0), if([pfdi_2a_s]!='NaN',1,0), if([pfdi_3a_s]!='NaN',1,0), if([pfdi_4a_s]!='NaN',1,0), if([pfdi_5a_s]!='NaN',1,0), if([pfdi_6a_s]!='NaN',1,0) ) )*25, 2)

Field.ElementLabel: Scale score CRADI-8

ElementEnum.RawValue: round(( sum( if([pfdi_7_s]!=1,[pfdi_7_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_8_s]!=1,[pfdi_8_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_9_s]!=1,[pfdi_9_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_10_s]!=1,[pfdi_10_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_11_s]!=1,[pfdi_11_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_12_s]!=1,[pfdi_12_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_13_s]!=1,[pfdi_13_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_14_s]!=1,[pfdi_14_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_7a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_7a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_8a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_8a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_9a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_9a_s],'NaN'),if([pfdi_10a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_10a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_11a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_11a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_12a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_12a_s], 'NaN'), if([pfdi_13a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_13a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_14a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_14a_s], 'NaN') ) / sum( if ([pfdi_7_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_8_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_9_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_10_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_11_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_12_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_13_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_14_s]= 0, 1, 0),if ([pfdi_7a_s]!= 'NaN', 1, 0),if ([pfdi_8a_s]!= 'NaN', 1, 0),if ([pfdi_9a_s]!= 'NaN', 1, 0),if ([pfdi_10a_s]!= 'NaN', 1, 0), if ([pfdi_11a_s]!= 'NaN', 1, 0), if ([pfdi_12a_s]!= 'NaN', 1, 0), if ([pfdi_13a_s]!='NaN', 1, 0), if ([pfdi_14a_s]!= 'NaN', 1, 0) ) )*25,2)

Field.ElementLabel: Scale score UDI-6

ElementEnum.RawValue: round(( sum( if([pfdi_15_s]!=1,[pfdi_15_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_16_s]!=1,[pfdi_16_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_17_s]!=1,[pfdi_17_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_18_s]!=1,[pfdi_18_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_19_s]!=1,[pfdi_19_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_20_s]!=1,[pfdi_20_s],'NaN'), if([pfdi_15a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_15a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_16a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_16a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_17a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_17a_s],'NaN'),if([pfdi_18a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_18a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_19a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_19a_s], 'NaN'),if([pfdi_20a_s]!='NaN', [pfdi_20a_s], 'NaN') ) / sum( if ([pfdi_15_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_16_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_17_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_18_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_19_s]= 0, 1, 0), if ([pfdi_20_s]= 0, 1, 0),if ([pfdi_15a_s] != 'NaN', 1, 0) , if ([pfdi_16a_s] !='NaN', 1, 0) , if ([pfdi_17a_s] != 'NaN', 1, 0) , if ([pfdi_18a_s] != 'NaN', 1, 0) , if ([pfdi_19a_s] != 'NaN', 1, 0) , if ([pfdi_20a_s] != 'NaN', 1, 0) ) )*25,2)

Field.ElementLabel: PFDI-20 Summary Score

ElementEnum.RawValue: sum([pfdi_scale_score_popdi_6],[pfdi_scale_score_cradi_8],[pfdi_scale_score_udi_6])
